summary: A comprehensive test suite for the Fractal Tasks Core library, covering unit and integration tests of image conversion, registration, illumination correction, segmentation, multiplexing, napari workflow integration, schema validation, and command‑line interface compliance for microscopy data processed into OME‑Zarr format.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, robustness, and standards compliance of image‑analysis pipelines in the Fractal framework, enabling reliable automated processing of high‑content screening and multiplexed microscopy datasets in production and continuous‑integration environments.
